title: Data Engineer Intern
description: Build ETL pipelines using Python and SQL. Work with AWS S3, Glue, Athena. Experience with data modeling, Spark, and cloud systems preferred.

title: Data Analyst Co-op
description: Analyze large datasets using SQL and Python. Build dashboards with Power BI or Tableau. Collaborate with stakeholders to deliver insights.

title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Develop backend services using Python, Java, or Go. Work with distributed systems, APIs, and cloud infrastructure (AWS/GCP).

title: Data Science Intern
description: Apply machine learning models, data preprocessing, and statistical analysis. Experience with pandas, scikit-learn, and visualization required.

title: Business Intelligence Intern
description: Create reports and dashboards using SQL and BI tools. Support data-driven decisions for product and marketing teams.

title: Cloud Data Intern
description: Design cloud-based data pipelines. Use Python, SQL, Kafka, and Spark. Knowledge of Azure or AWS is an asset.

title: AI & Analytics Intern
description: Support analytics for large engineering datasets. Use Python, SQL, and data visualization tools. Interest in AI and data engineering preferred.

title: Backend/Data Intern
description: Build APIs and data services using Python and PostgreSQL. Support ETL workflows and improve data reliability.

title: Operations Data Intern
description: Automate reporting pipelines using Python and Excel. Maintain SQL databases and generate weekly dashboards.

title: Product Data Intern
description: Analyze user behavior data, write SQL queries, and build dashboards. Experience with data pipelines is a plus.
